episodes.title: "How I took down NXIVM cult."
episodes.description:
“He was the right-hand man to one of the most dangerous cult leaders in modern history. What started as a quest to help others turned into a descent into psychological hell. But instead of staying silent, he turned the camera on the truth. This is the story of survival, self-betrayal, moral injury, and redemption.”

🎥 Featuring raw truths behind The Vow and the NXIVM cult, this is an unfiltered conversation about abuse, awakening, and finding yourself after falling apart.

🔔 Subscribe for more real stories that uncover the darkest and most inspiring sides of human nature.

Dave's website - www.davidsutcliffe.com

#nxivm #cult #therapy

episodes.title: Mark Vicente Talks Narcissism and Escaping the NXIVM Cult
episodes.description:
Mark Vicente is a South African-born filmmaker, author, and speaker, best known as the director and cinematographer for the acclaimed documentary "What the Bleep Do We Know?!" 

He is also known for his involvement with and subsequent whistleblowing against the NXIVM organization, where he became a key witness in the federal trial against its leadership, documented in the acclaimed HBO series "The Vow."

Vicente next film is "The Narcissist's Playbook," currently in post-production. 

https://www.markvicente.com/

Dave's website: davidsutcliffe.com
